title: BRIEF-Lassonde Industries Inc. Announces A Change In The Management Of Its U.S. Subsidiary Lassonde Pappas And Company, Inc.
text:
Market News April 18, 2018 / 1:10 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Lassonde Industries Inc. Announces A Change In The Management Of Its U.S. Subsidiary Lassonde Pappas And Company, Inc. Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  Lassonde Industries Inc: 
* LASSONDE INDUSTRIES INC. ANNOUNCES A CHANGE IN THE MANAGEMENT OF ITS U.S. SUBSIDIARY LASSONDE PAPPAS AND COMPANY, INC. 
* LASSONDE INDUSTRIES INC - DEPARTURE OF MARK MCNEIL, PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF LASSONDE PAPPAS AND COMPANY
